00026 #include <stdio.h>
00027 #include <string.h>
00028 #include <libcfs/util/ioctl.h>
00029 #include "liblnetconfig.h"
00030 #include "cyaml.h"
00031 
00032 static int
00033 lustre_ko2iblnd_show_net(struct cYAML *lndparams,
00034                          struct lnet_ioctl_config_lnd_tunables *tunables)
00035 {
00036         struct lnet_ioctl_config_o2iblnd_tunables *lnd_cfg;
00037 
00038         lnd_cfg = &tunables->lt_tun_u.lt_o2ib;
00039 
00040         if (cYAML_create_number(lndparams, "peercredits_hiw",
00041                                 lnd_cfg->lnd_peercredits_hiw) == NULL)
00042                 return -1;
00043 
00044         if (cYAML_create_number(lndparams, "map_on_demand",
00045                                 lnd_cfg->lnd_map_on_demand) == NULL)
00046                 return -1;
00047 
00048         if (cYAML_create_number(lndparams, "concurrent_sends",
00049                                 lnd_cfg->lnd_concurrent_sends) == NULL)
00050                 return -1;
00051 
00052         if (cYAML_create_number(lndparams, "fmr_pool_size",
00053                                 lnd_cfg->lnd_fmr_pool_size) == NULL)
00054                 return -1;
00055 
00056         if (cYAML_create_number(lndparams, "fmr_flush_trigger",
00057                                 lnd_cfg->lnd_fmr_flush_trigger) == NULL)
00058                 return -1;
00059 
00060         if (cYAML_create_number(lndparams, "fmr_cache",
00061                                 lnd_cfg->lnd_fmr_cache) == NULL)
00062                 return -1;
00063         return 0;
00064 }
00065 
00066 int
00067 lustre_interface_show_net(struct cYAML *interfaces, unsigned int index,
00068                           bool detail, struct lnet_ioctl_config_data *data,
00069                           struct lnet_ioctl_net_config *net_config)
00070 {
00071         char ni_index[2]; /* LNET_MAX_INTERFACES is only 16 */
00072 
00073         if (strlen(net_config->ni_interfaces[index]) == 0)
00074                 return 0;
00075 
00076         snprintf(ni_index, sizeof(ni_index), "%d", index);
00077         if (cYAML_create_string(interfaces, ni_index,
00078                                 net_config->ni_interfaces[index]) == NULL)
00079                 return -1;
00080 
00081         if (detail) {
00082                 __u32 net = LNET_NETTYP(LNET_NIDNET(data->cfg_nid));
00083                 struct lnet_ioctl_config_lnd_tunables *lnd_cfg;
00084                 struct cYAML *lndparams;
00085 
00086                 if (data->cfg_config_u.cfg_net.net_interface_count == 0 ||
00087                     net != O2IBLND)
00088                         return 0;
00089 
00090                 lndparams = cYAML_create_object(interfaces, "lnd tunables");
00091                 if (lndparams == NULL)
00092                         return -1;
00093 
00094                 lnd_cfg = (struct lnet_ioctl_config_lnd_tunables *)net_config->cfg_bulk;
00095                 if (lustre_ko2iblnd_show_net(lndparams, lnd_cfg) < 0)
00096                         return -1;
00097         }
00098         return 0;
00099 }
00100 
00101 static void
00102 lustre_ko2iblnd_parse_net(struct cYAML *lndparams,
00103                           struct lnet_ioctl_config_lnd_tunables *lnd_cfg)
00104 {
00105         struct cYAML *map_on_demand = NULL, *concurrent_sends = NULL;
00106         struct cYAML *fmr_pool_size = NULL, *fmr_cache = NULL;
00107         struct cYAML *fmr_flush_trigger = NULL;
00108 
00109         map_on_demand = cYAML_get_object_item(lndparams, "map_on_demand");
00110         lnd_cfg->lt_tun_u.lt_o2ib.lnd_map_on_demand =
00111                 (map_on_demand) ? map_on_demand->cy_valueint : 0;
00112 
00113         concurrent_sends = cYAML_get_object_item(lndparams, "concurrent_sends");
00114         lnd_cfg->lt_tun_u.lt_o2ib.lnd_concurrent_sends =
00115                 (concurrent_sends) ? concurrent_sends->cy_valueint : 0;
00116 
00117         fmr_pool_size = cYAML_get_object_item(lndparams, "fmr_pool_size");
00118         lnd_cfg->lt_tun_u.lt_o2ib.lnd_fmr_pool_size =
00119                 (fmr_pool_size) ? fmr_pool_size->cy_valueint : 0;
00120 
00121         fmr_flush_trigger = cYAML_get_object_item(lndparams,
00122                                                   "fmr_flush_trigger");
00123         lnd_cfg->lt_tun_u.lt_o2ib.lnd_fmr_flush_trigger =
00124                 (fmr_flush_trigger) ? fmr_flush_trigger->cy_valueint : 0;
00125 
00126         fmr_cache = cYAML_get_object_item(lndparams, "fmr_cache");
00127         lnd_cfg->lt_tun_u.lt_o2ib.lnd_fmr_cache =
00128                 (fmr_cache) ? fmr_cache->cy_valueint : 0;
00129 }
00130 
00131 void
00132 lustre_interface_parse(struct cYAML *lndparams, const char *dev_name,
00133                        struct lnet_ioctl_config_lnd_tunables *lnd_cfg)
00134 {
00135         if (dev_name != NULL && strstr(dev_name, "ib"))
00136                 lustre_ko2iblnd_parse_net(lndparams, lnd_cfg);
00137 }
